I do research in psychology, health, and predictive modelling. Currently I investigate questions related to public health policy through my work as a Quantitative Specialist at [Center for Health and Policy Management](http://chpm.fk.ugm.ac.id/) in Faculty of Medicine, Universitas Gadjah Mada.
